name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 27, a job appointment and removal notice from the Shifang Municipal Government showed that Yang Yongjun was promoted to vice principal of Shifang Middle School.
At the end of November 2022, a recording of Shifang Middle School was leaked. At that time, Yang Yongjun read out secret documents from the central government and Sichuan Province at a meeting, announcing that Shifang Middle School would organize and implement a group immunity experiment, which caused great panic among parents and students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, in Wenzhou, Zhejiang, a car owner was driving a NIO car when the vehicle suddenly lost control and crashed into a small car on the roadside. The airbag did not deploy throughout the process.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2 (Released) Chongqing. A woman reported Zhou Siying, a deputy director of the Civil Affairs Bureau, for abusing his power to commit corruption, hiding more than 1 billion yuan of assets under his parents' names, and helping her husband to obtain fake military officer certificates and ID cards to evade legal responsibility.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: He Jiankui, who was sentenced to three years in prison for the "gene-edited baby case", was recently reported to have regained investment to set up a laboratory and recruit graduates. He said, "Gene weapons will be the core weapon of the next world war. If human genes are edited, it will not be a problem to create the Hulk or Captain America."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of the start of the new school term in schools across the country, the magazine "Qiushi" sponsored by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China published an article by President Xi Jinping, which stated: We must never cultivate people who have Chinese faces but not Chinese hearts, no Chinese feelings, and lack Chinese flavor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Shenyang, Liaoning. After an old man asked to give up his seat on the subway to no avail, he scolded the students, "I don't have to pay for the ride. You are the trash of society. Without us, the older generation, how would you be where you are today?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Voice of America, when Qiushi published Xi Jinping's article, the Hong Kong Education Bureau also officially included "patriotic education" and "Xi Jinping Thought" in the junior high school curriculum. Some Hong Kong teachers said that the national flag is now bigger than the principal and anything else.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1 (Released) Yunnan. Hundreds of villagers knelt before the police to protest against the closure of the rural school Wenyu Middle School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "There are clouds on a woman's chest and the tips of a man's legs glow. This pair of smart glasses can not only purify the image but also eliminate all unhealthy sounds." Recently, blogger "Mr. Ye" released a video satirizing the current censorship system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens replied: "Those who understand can go and surrender."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media reported that a former Chinese employee of Japan's NHK returned to China. Some netizens believed that this was a self-torture tactic and that the employee was a spy sent by Japan to return to China to gather intelligence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, an internal PPT of Kuaishou was leaked. The picture showed: For the class of 2024, we received more than 160,000 resumes from fresh graduates and expect to hire 1,400 people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, the Zhaoqing government in Guangdong Province recruited contract security guards, who were required to have a disability certificate, but whose personal conditions had to meet the job requirements.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Dong Hong, the inventor of “malicious return home” and the county magistrate of Dancheng County, Henan Province, is now scheduled to be appointed as the secretary of the Dancheng County Party Committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 2, a murder occurred in Area C of Wanda Vista Residences on Hongqi Street in Changchun, Jilin. A large number of armed police were dispatched to the scene, and multiple snipers were set up.
There are many different opinions on the cause of the incident circulating online, but the more consistent one is that the police who rushed to the scene after a conflict occurred in the community were stabbed to death by a man who took the police's gun and fired.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 1, the owners of Nanbin Garden in Potou District, Zhanjiang, Guangdong, launched a rights protection campaign because their children could not attend No. 2 Middle School Haidong Primary School.
Parents held the admission application letter approved by the Education Bureau to seek justice, and several parents were dragged and arrested by the police.
Since August, we have received many rights protection cases from all over the country because their children could not go to school after purchasing school district housing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Huaibei, Anhui. Some parents reported that the cafeteria of Qiushi Middle School in Suixi County had few dishes and was unhygienic. Videos showed that some students shouted "starving" and some even had only staple food. The school said: 700 yuan a month, the dishes are large enough, and eating together for four people is like eating at home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/rGJ7yHyfKK

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 2 (Released) A woman reported under her real name that the dean of the School of Physical Education of Hebei Normal University asked her to write graduation thesis for foreign students, and that he had committed other illegal and disciplinary violations such as corrupt teaching ethics.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that the "Black Myth Wukong" on the domestic game platform WeGame is a harmonized version.
The "wine" in the game was replaced with "nectar", and the original "wine upgrade" Wegame version was changed to "nectar upgrade".
Some netizens replied "It is recommended to change the name of the game to Red Myth Wukong"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Queshan County People's Government: If you want to run for village party secretary, you must meet several major conditions. First, you must have a family background and influence; second, economic foundation is an important guarantee for running for village party secretary. In rural areas, only those with money can have the confidence to run for election and make a difference in the election.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 30, a graduate of Zhejiang Media College released a recording of himself being bullied at school four years ago.
In the recording, student leaders entered the broadcasting class to "train new students". The publisher said that the humiliation and insults during the period caused great psychological damage to himself, which resonated with a large number of netizens.
But at the same time, the video also triggered opposition from some "school defenders", who believed that the incident had passed and it was a smear on the school to release it now.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/sOgljy4Di6

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a female driver of a Land Rover in Qingdao drove against traffic and beat a retired soldier, which attracted attention. September 1, Rushan, Shandong. A retired soldier said that he was beaten and fought back and was sentenced to 9 months in prison with a one-year probation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1 (Released) Hebei Hengshui. Parents posted a video to complain that Hengshui No. 1 Middle School has 24 beds in a dormitory and there is no air conditioning in such a hot day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"What's wrong with our education?"
September 2, Xuhui Middle School in Shanghai. A group of junior high school students were suspected to be punished by standing outside in 35 degrees. During the period, one student collapsed due to heat stroke.
However, shockingly, the other students at the scene were stunned and no one came forward to help. A male teacher slowly walked over and returned to the house.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 1, Sanmenxia, Henan. A skinny old man sat on the ground, with garbage piled up beside him. He was chewing a watermelon rind that he didn't know where it came from. The road sign behind him read "A prosperous culture leads to a prosperous country; a strong culture leads to a strong nation."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@Xz4KJVI4h9NJP7H How is Xi Jinping inferior to Chairman Mao?
Please elaborate on this

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Hebei, a 75-year-old veteran posted a video saying that he responded to Chairman Mao's call and obeyed the party's call. Wherever the party points, the gun will go. But why are the meritorious officials who defend the country not treated as well as the five-guarantee households, with only 50 yuan in subsidies per month, while the five-guarantee households do not pay anything, but receive 1,000 yuan per month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Xz4KJVI4h9NJP7H Then don't be so scared that you delete the comment

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, Lai Ching-te said in an exclusive interview with a TV station that China wants to take over Taiwan not for the sake of territorial integrity. If it is really for territorial integrity, why doesn't China take back the territory that was occupied by Russia now that Russia is at its weakest?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, a netizen replied on Zhihu: I once posted a message "Justice will prevail" under the news about the Russian-Ukrainian war, and then a group of people scolded me, saying that I was a dog raised by the United States and a traitor. I thought to myself, it turns out that they also know who is just!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 2, China News Weekly reported an article titled "National Highways, will toll collection resume again?", revealing the trend of national highways returning to toll collection. 
According to a statistical table compiled by Li Peilin, deputy researcher at the National Development and Reform Commission, since 2021, many provinces have successively issued announcements on the opening of national highway toll stations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 2, the owners of Building DK3 of Sunac Yuheyuan in Xianyang, Shaanxi blocked the road and jumped off the bridge to defend their rights.
